org.gradle.jvm

Interface JarBinarySpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BinarySpec, Buildable, BuildableModelElement, JvmBinarySpec, Named

    @Incubating
public interface JarBinarySpec
extends JvmBinarySpec
    Definition of a Jar file binary that is to be built by Gradle.
